lead_paragraph: The Detroit Tigers and Curtis Granderson agreed to a five-year, $30.25 million contract that includes a club option for 2013 that could make the deal worth up to $43.25 million.Granderson, 26, had a breakout season last year, hitting .302 with 23 home runs and 74 runs batted in.
